scripts.test-report: npx testmo automation:run:submit --instance '$TESTMO_URL' --project-id 1 --name 'Selenium test run for "$BROWSER"' --source 'frontend' --results results/*.xml
scripts.test-ci: npx testmo automation:run:submit --instance '$TESTMO_URL' --project-id 1 --name 'Selenium test run for "$BROWSER"' --source 'frontend' --results results/*.xml -- npm run test-junit
